## Table of Contents

### Classes

## Classes

### <a name="smee"></a>`smee`

The smee class.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `smee` class:

* [`url`](#-smee--url)
* [`path`](#-smee--path)
* [`port`](#-smee--port)
* [`image`](#-smee--image)

##### <a name="-smee--url"></a>`url`

Data type: `Stdlib::HTTPSUrl`

URL to the smee topic to watch for webhook events.

##### <a name="-smee--path"></a>`path`

Data type: `String`

URL path to post proxied requests to.

Default value: `'/'`

##### <a name="-smee--port"></a>`port`

Data type: `Integer`

Local HTTP server port.

Default value: `3000`

##### <a name="-smee--image"></a>`image`

Data type: `String[1]`
